Minions Stuart, Kevin and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a super-villain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

Directors: Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin
Writer: Brian Lynch
Stars: Pierre Coffin, Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm
Genres: Animation | Comedy | Family
Country: USA
Language: English


Minions.2015.HD-TS.XVID.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources:

Video: both Portuguese HD-Cams
Audio: Sweet Line Big Thx to S4NDM4N

Notes:

First Portuguese cam has great quality as it should be, but was missing some minutes
Second time they went they did a complete version, bit more zoomed in and a bit unsharp, but still ok to watch
They wont go a third time i read, and i do think its not needed anyways
Movie hits most of europe in august, so a 720p is not around within the next month and by that time a web-dl might be out already
this will do just fine

It would be easier to just use the second cam cause its complete but why not use the better one as main body and fill in the gaps from the 2nd one, to get a perfect release
Took me 6 further hours to cut in the parts, so video is now complete and even the afterend credits are now fully there, so all from 0 to end

Encode:

First cam was great as mentioned, but needed rotating and fixing perspective, fixed rgb added sharpness and removed some flicker
Second cam was not that sharp, cause it was zoomed in a bit, i added borders and centered to meet the resolution of first cam

Audio was very good again thx S4NDM4N,Lipsynced audio to my video

will do me till retail
enjoy

Video: 680x336 @bitrate 2200 2pass
Audio: English Line Stereo 2.0
Sample: yes included
